ignorebackupFlagDescription: flag to ignore creating a local backup of retrieved files
ignoremanagedFlagDescription: flag to ignore retrieving managed package files
ignorenamespacesFlagDescription: flag to ignore retrieving namespace prefixed package files
manifestonlyFlagDescription: flag to only create manifest/package.xml and don't download meta data files
stagemodeFlagDescription: stage mode (default is false) otherwise dev mode (default is true)
